00025 #ifndef _BASE_PRODUCTEXPRESSION_
00026 #define _BASE_PRODUCTEXPRESSION_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/BinaryOpExpression>
00030 #include <base/SumExpression>
00031 
00032 namespace base {
00033 
00034 
00035 //
00036 // Sum operator - adds args
00037 //
00038 
00039 class ProductExpression : public BinaryOpExpression 
00040 {
00041 public:
00042   ProductExpression(ref<ExpressionNode> left, ref<ExpressionNode> right)
00043     : BinaryOpExpression(left, right) {}
00044   ProductExpression(const ProductExpression& e)
00045     : BinaryOpExpression(e) {}
00046 
00047   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewObj ProductExpression(*this); }
00048   virtual String className() const { return String("ProductExpression"); }
00049 
00050   virtual NodeType type() const { return NodeType(BinaryOp|Product); } 
00051 
00052   virtual String toString() const 
00053     { return  String("(")+leftArg->toString()+ "*"+rightArg->toString()+")"; }
00054 
00055 protected:
00056   ProductExpression() {}
00057 
00058   virtual void cacheValue(const Vector& params) const
00059     { value = leftArg->evaluate(params) * rightArg->evaluate(params); valueCached=true; }
00060 
00061   virtual void cacheDerivative(Int withRespectToIndex) const
00062     {
00063       derivative = ref<ExpressionNode>( NewObj SumExpression( ref<ExpressionNode>(
00064         NewObj ProductExpression( leftArg, rightArg->differentiate(withRespectToIndex) )), ref<ExpressionNode>(
00065         NewObj ProductExpression( leftArg->differentiate(withRespectToIndex), rightArg ) ) ) ); 
00066       derivWithRespToIndex = withRespectToIndex;
00067       derivCached = true;
00068     }
00069 
00070   virtual void operationCounts(Int& addsub, Int& multdiv, Int& trig) const 
00071     { BinaryOpExpression::operationCounts(addsub,multdiv,trig); multdiv++; }
00072 
00073   friend class Serializable::SerializableDerivedInstantiator<ProductExpression>;
00074   
00075 };
00076 
00077 } // base
00078 
00079 #endif
